statements: SELECT * FROM BalanceSheet
SELECT id, date, asset_balance FROM BalanceSheet WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, date, liability_balance FROM BalanceSheet ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM BalanceSheet WHERE asset_balance > 10000 ORDER BY asset_balance DESC
SELECT id, asset_balance, liability_balance FROM BalanceSheet WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, date, asset_balance, liability_balance FROM BalanceSheet WHERE asset_balance > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM BalanceSheet WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY asset_balance DESC, date ASC
SELECT id, asset_balance FROM BalanceSheet WHERE liability_balance < 5000 AND asset_balance > 0
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records, SUM(asset_balance) AS total_assets FROM BalanceSheet
SELECT id, date, CASE WHEN asset_balance > liability_balance THEN 'Positive' ELSE 'Negative' END AS balance_status FROM BalanceSheet ORDER BY balance_status
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE assets > 1000
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM income_statement WHERE expenses < 500
SELECT date, assets, liabilities FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses
SELECT id, date, assets, liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE date = '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE assets > liabilities;
SELECT id, date, assets, liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses FROM income_statement WHERE date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT SUM(assets) AS total_assets, SUM(liabilities) AS total_liabilities FROM balance_sheet;
SELECT * FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY revenue DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet
SELECT liabilities, asset FROM balance_sheet
SELECT asset, liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE asset = 'Cash'
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities = 'Accounts Payable'
SELECT asset FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities <> 'Inventory'
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE asset = 'Cash'
SELECT liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE asset = 'Inventory'
SELECT asset, liabilities FROM balance_sheet WHERE asset = 'Equipment' AND liabilities = 'Accounts Payable'
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities = 'Loan' ORDER BY asset DESC
SELECT DISTINCT asset FROM balance_sheet WHERE liabilities IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, account_name, balance FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM account ORDER BY account_name;
SELECT company_name, location FROM company WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, account_name, account_type FROM balance_sheet WHERE account_type = 'Assets';
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM balance_sheet WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT company_name, location FROM company WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT account_name, revenue, expenses FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM account WHERE account_type = 'Asset';
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT revenue, expenses FROM income_statement WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT amount, status FROM account_receivable WHERE status = 'unpaid';
SELECT * FROM account_payable WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM balance_sheet ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT revenue, expenses, date FROM income_statement WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT id, amount, status FROM account_receivable WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM account_payable WHERE status = 'paid' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
